headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA Online on Xbox 360 Will Shut Down on December 16, 2021
content:
The Xbox 360 version of GTA Online, including website stat tracking via the Rockstar Games Social Club, will officially be shutting down on December 16, 2021.

Please note, these changes are strictly for the Xbox 360 version of GTA Online, and will have no impact on access to, or progress within, the Grand Theft Auto V Story Mode.

For more information on how the shutdown impacts progress and purchases in Xbox 360 GTA Online, visit Rockstar Support.
